name: Without kidney
description:
This game is about THICС blacksmith George who wanted to buy a new house, but he couldn't pay the mortgage. A bank cut out his kidney and threw him into a hole. George crushed down a goblin who was in that hole. George took his grappling hook and gun. He decided to kill the main person in that bank - "Capitalist BOSS"

There are 2 locations in this game: cave and desert. Main tools to explore the world are a grappling hook which can hook into the environment and a gun. You can shoot under yourself and jump from explosions. The player will fight with different bosses and enemies in these locations. You will face various obstacles and mini-games. Also you can find special artifacts to upgrade the player or change some mechanics.
